error.nameUnique: The name should be unique. Please try again.
error.nameInvalid: Username is invalid. It must be between 2 and 50 characters. Only letters, digits, '.', '-', and '_' are allowed.
error.invalidEmail: The email address is invalid. Please correct it.
error.invalidPassword: Your entered password does not match the needed complexity. It should be minimum 8 characters long and contain at least: one upper and one lower case characters, one digit. Please try again.
error.confirmPassword: Your entered passwords do not match. Please try again.

vmpConfig.title: Manage Configuration
vmpConfig.syncScopeTooltip: Defines if the tablet will sync data for the specific site or the whole country (depends on the size of the study).
vmpConfig.operatorCredentialsOfflineRetentionTimeT: Duration for which the operator credentials will be stored on the local tablet while offline. Once this expires, the operator needs to be online to log in again.
vmpConfig.operatorSessionTimeoutTooltip: Duration for which an operator session is active. After this time, the operator is requested to log in again.
vmpConfig.manufacturersTooltip: Vaccine manufacturers. A regular expression may be defined for the vial barcode format. If a scanned vial barcode matches this regular expression, this manufacturer will be pre-selected in the app.
vmpConfig.regimenTooltip: Dosing regimens that participants can follow. The expected manufacturer for each dose should be listed. All regimens must be configured on the Manage Vaccination Schedule page.
vmpConfig.canUseDifferentManufacturersTooltip: Indicate whether the operator is allowed to administer a vaccine from a different manufacturer than is specified in the regimen.
vmpConfig.personLanguagesTooltip: Possible languages in which participants can receive their messages from the application.
vmpConfig.authStepsTooltip: Methods used to identify the participants. Order can be changed, as well as whether the step is mandatory for all participants.
vmpConfig.irisScoreTooltip: Minimum iris quality (in percent) to accept when performing an iris scan. Operator will be asked to rescan the iris if below this quality.
vmpConfig.addressFieldsTooltip: For each country, define which address fields should be shown in the app, as well as what they should be displayed as. E.g.: Address 1, display as 'Street'.
vmpConfig.allowManualParticipantIDEntryTooltip: Indicate whether the operator is allowed to manually enter a participant ID.

error.configurationInvalid: Some fields are not entered correctly. Please check the configuration.
error.displayNameRequired: Display Name is a mandatory field
error.fieldTypeRequired: Field Type is a mandatory field
error.manufacturerAssigned: To delete this manufacturer, please first remove it from the defined regimen.
error.regimenLinked: This regimen is already in use and cannot be removed.
error.regimenManufacturersEmpty: At least one manufacturer for each dose should be listed

warning.deleteManufacturer: Are you sure you want to delete this manufacturer?
warning.deleteRegimen: Are you sure you want to delete this regimen?

info.addRegimen: You are adding a new regimen. Please make sure you also add the schedule for this regimen on the Manage Vaccination Schedule page

vmpVaccinationSchedule.title: Manage Vaccination Schedule
vmpVaccinationSchedule.dosesTooltip: Dosing that is configured for selected regimen
